## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e51aef3cb0dd796018acdd2532eac7e29f9b6d644406bd8a108bbbe1c415a351)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pay-by-bank-dashboard-server' @ 1.0.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
